content.raw:
To better clarify this issue:

It appears the “broadcast” packet destination is currently broken in cloudsim, including for beacon packets. If this is indeed the case it should be fairly easy to get a repro, but I’d be happy to provide a minimal repro if it would help. 

I believe the culprit is the code segment in my previous post. A service named “broadcast” doesn’t exist so the comms relay doesn’t handle that case correctly.
content.html:
To better clarify this issue:

It appears the “broadcast” packet destination is currently broken in cloudsim, including for beacon packets. If this is indeed the case it should be fairly easy to get a repro, but I’d be happy to provide a minimal repro if it would help.

I believe the culprit is the code segment in my previous post. A service named “broadcast” doesn’t exist so the comms relay doesn’t handle that case correctly.
